extracted_text:
A minimum lot area of fifteen thousand (15,000) square feet shall be
required if only public water or only public sewer is available, twenty
thousand (20,000) square feet shall be required if no public water or sewer
is available. If both services are available, then a minimum lot area of ten
thousand (10,000) square feet shall be required.
llm_output.rationale: This text directly specifies the minimum lot area requirements for the B-2 Marine Business District, with different values depending on the availability of public water and sewer services.
llm_output.answer: 15,000 sq ft (if only public water or sewer available); 20,000 sq ft (if no public water or sewer available); 10,000 sq ft (if both services available)
